attributes.action: STOP A TWO SYSTEM PLANNING-TRAVELLERS V HOUSE HOLDERS
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT THE WHOLE PLANNING LAWS CHANGED TO MAKE THE SYSTEM NOW BIASED TOWARDS `TRAVELLERS`, HOUSEHOLDERS HAVE STRICT LAWS ON WHAT THEY CAN DO ON THERE OWN LAND, YET TRAVELLERS GET AWAY WITH IT MOST OF THE TIME, THEY PULL UP IN MASS ON COMMON LAND AND PRIVATE WITH THE OWNERS HAVING TO TAKE COURT ACTION TO MOVE THEM ON AND CLEAR THERE MESS UP AFTER THEM, YET IF IT WAS SOMEONE IN A CARAVAN PARKED OVERNIGHT THE POLICE WOULD MOVE THEM ON, MANY COME FROM IRELAND OVER HERE, WHY BECAUSE THEY DO NOT ALLOW IT THERE ?
